title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: 7 North Smithfield Town Hall
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Self Guided Walking Tours     Slatersville Self Guided Tour     7 North Smithfield Town Hall                  7 North Smithfield Town Hall        John Slater NPS       Built in 1921 on land donated by Henry Kendall, the North Smithfield Town Hall is an attractive brick neo-Georgian style structure. A hotel and boarding house stood here before the town hall.       Introduction 1 Slatersville Reservoir 2 Slatersville Library and Western Mills 3 Slatersville Mills 4 Slatersville Worker Housing 5 Slatersville Church and Common 6 John Slater House 8 Slatersville Commercial Blocks
